metadata.name: JOIE DE VIVRE
metadata.description:
DESCRIPTION:

Resigned to a permanent smile, this creature emerged from the residual energy of the TV owner's preferred genres of entertainment - a hybrid of comedy and science fiction; forced into existence against its own will.

BIO:

Chroma Code is a Canadian artist that specializes in analog glitching, photography & filmmaking.

DETAILS:

"Joie De Vivre" is a piece of art generated by an AI and subsequently modified/composited using image editing software. The modified image was then transmitted through an analog signal chain, which was then directly rendered onto a CRT TV manufactured between 1990 and 2002, utilizing a conversion process. The artwork was deliberately distorted and color graded through the use of various video synthesis hardware. Finally, the piece was refined and polished using video editing software.

Video Size: 2160 x 2700px
TV Model & Year: Sylvania, 2002
